about_the_game:
This 2D action role-playing game blends platforming exploration with a turn-based strategic button timed battle system, offering an immersive combat experience that demands both strategy and reflexes. With a deep narrative, diverse character abilities, and a tactical battle system, players will uncover the mysteries of the past while shaping the destiny of their fallen warriors.

STORY

After dying in a war, Rosetta awakens to find herself reborn with the divine power of a Valkyrie. With no memory of how or why she was granted this fate, she embarks on a journey alongside her Einherjars (warriors bound to her service) to uncover the secrets behind her resurrection. As she battles formidable foes, navigates political schemes, and unravels ancient mysteries, she must reconcile her existence as both a human and a goddess, walking the fine line between mortality and divinity.

GAMEPLAY

This 2D RPG platformer offers fast-paced exploration and dynamic turn-based combat infused with button-mashing mechanics. Players will:

  • Control a party of unique characters, each with their own abilities, stats, and combat roles.

  • Engage in high-intensity battles, where well-timed inputs determine attack success, skill execution, and defensive maneuvers.

  • Manage inventory, skills, and burst attacks, utilizing an in-depth menu system that includes equipment, items, and status effects.

  • Strategize between class and subclass combinations, customizing the party’s strengths to adapt to different enemies and battle scenarios.

  • Unravel a deep narrative through exploration, character interactions, and battle-driven storytelling.

With a balance of skillful execution and tactical decision-making, players must master both combat and strategy to guide Rosetta and her Einherjars through their perilous journey.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GCN+, NVIDIA Kepler+, or Intel HD 5000-series or newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13.6 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU (AMD GCN-based GPU or newer, NVIDIA Kepler-based GPU or newer, Intel HD 4000 or newer)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
